title: Thai venture to produce jet fuel from used cooking oil
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
A joint venture of three Thai companies in the petroleum industry has announced plans to make aviation fuel from used cooking oil. The project will receive an initial investment between eight and ten billion baht ($273 million) from its stakeholders,

The post Thai venture to produce jet fuel from used cooking oil appeared first on Investvine.
